resources.string: Don\'t have account? click here for register

In this application you can make use of your smart door for your pet, you will have to connect your mobile device to the Bluetooth door so that later you can use the functions of opening and closing it for greater security, in the lower menu you will find the sections that you can use To make use of them you will only have to click where the padlock indicates.
Click on open and wait a few seconds for the lock to change color.
Click on close and wait a few seconds for the lock to change color.
1. You will find yourself on the home screen, you can use the lower menu to move between the functions of the application
2. To use the application and the door, connect your mobile device to the door\'s blutooth to make use of its functions.
3. Once connected to bluetooth you can use the open and close function.
4. In the open section you will have to click on the button to operate and open the door, in a few seconds the color of the padlock will change color indicating that the door was opened.

5. In the closing section you will have to click on the button called close in order to make the door work so that it closes automatically and locks, wait a few seconds for the color of the lock to change that will indicate that the door was closed correctly.
Would you like close the session?
